wikipedia_page.main:
Albert Widdowson (31 March 1864 – 28 April 1938) was an English cricketer who played for Derbyshire in 1894.
Widdowson was born in Bingham, Nottinghamshire and in 1881 was working on a farm. He played one match Derbyshire in  the 1894 season in July against Surrey in which he made one run.Widdowson was identified as a scorer for Derbyshire in 1927.  He died in Duffield at the age of 74.
